11UVW_INLINE UDPDataEvent::UDPDataEvent(Addr sndr, std::unique_ptr<char[]> buf, std::size_t len, bool part) noexcept
12 : data{std::move(buf)}, length{len}, sender{std::move(sndr)}, partial{part}
13{}
14
15
16UVW_INLINE details::SendReq::SendReq(ConstructorAccess ca, std::shared_ptr<Loop> loop, std::unique_ptr<char[], Deleter> dt, unsigned int len)
17 : Request<SendReq, uv_udp_send_t>{ca, std::move(loop)},
18 data{std::move(dt)},
19 buf{uv_buf_init(data.get(), len)}
20{}
21
22
23UVW_INLINE void details::SendReq::send(uv_udp_t *handle, const struct sockaddr *addr) {
24 invoke(&uv_udp_send, get(), handle, &buf, 1, addr, &defaultCallback<SendEvent>);
25}
26
27
28UVW_INLINE UDPHandle::UDPHandle(ConstructorAccess ca, std::shared_ptr<Loop> ref, unsigned int f)
29 : Handle{ca, std::move(ref)}, tag{FLAGS}, flags{f}
30{}
31
32
33UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::init() {
34 return (tag == FLAGS) ? initialize(&uv_udp_init_ex, flags) : initialize(&uv_udp_init);
35}
36
37
38UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::open(OSSocketHandle socket) {
39 invoke(&uv_udp_open, get(), socket);
40}
41
42
43UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::bind(const sockaddr &addr, Flags<UDPHandle::Bind> opts) {
44 invoke(&uv_udp_bind, get(), &addr, opts);
45}

48UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::connect(const sockaddr &addr) {
49 invoke(&uv_udp_connect, get(), &addr);
50}

52
53template<typename I>
54UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::connect(std::string ip, unsigned int port) {
55 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
56 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
57 connect(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr));
58}
59
60
61template<typename I>
62UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::connect(Addr addr) {
63 connect<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port);
64}
65
66
67UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::disconnect() {
68 invoke(&uv_udp_connect, get(), nullptr);
69}
70
71
72template<typename I>
73UVW_INLINE Addr UDPHandle::peer() const noexcept {
74 return details::address<I>(&uv_udp_getpeername, get());
75}
76
77
78template<typename I>
79UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::bind(std::string ip, unsigned int port, Flags<Bind> opts) {
80 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
81 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
82 bind(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr), std::move(opts));
83}
84
85
86template<typename I>
87UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::bind(Addr addr, Flags<Bind> opts) {
88 bind<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port, std::move(opts));
89}

92template<typename I>
93UVW_INLINE Addr UDPHandle::sock() const noexcept {
94 return details::address<I>(&uv_udp_getsockname, get());
95}

98template<typename I>
99UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::multicastMembership(std::string multicast, std::string iface, Membership membership) {
100 return (0 == uv_udp_set_membership(get(), multicast.data(), iface.data(), static_cast<uv_membership>(membership)));
101}
102
103
104UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::multicastLoop(bool enable) {
105 return (0 == uv_udp_set_multicast_loop(get(), enable));
106}
107
108
109UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::multicastTtl(int val) {
110 return (0 == uv_udp_set_multicast_ttl(get(), val > 255 ? 255 : val));
111}
112
113
114template<typename I>
115UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::multicastInterface(std::string iface) {
116 return (0 == uv_udp_set_multicast_interface(get(), iface.data()));
117}
118
119
120UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::broadcast(bool enable) {
121 return (0 == uv_udp_set_broadcast(get(), enable));
122}
123
124
125UVW_INLINE bool UDPHandle::ttl(int val) {
126 return (0 == uv_udp_set_ttl(get(), val > 255 ? 255 : val));
127}
128
129
130UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(const sockaddr &addr, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
131 auto req = loop().resource<details::SendReq>(
132 std::unique_ptr<char[], details::SendReq::Deleter>{data.release(), [](char *ptr) {
133 delete[] ptr;
134 }}, len);
135
136 auto listener = [ptr = shared_from_this()](const auto &event, const auto &) {
137 ptr->publish(event);
138 };
139
140 req->once<ErrorEvent>(listener);
141 req->once<SendEvent>(listener);
142 req->send(get(), &addr);
143}
144
145
146template<typename I>
147UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(std::string ip, unsigned int port, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
148 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
149 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
150 send(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr), std::move(data), len);
151}
152
153
154template<typename I>
155UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(Addr addr, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
156 send<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port, std::move(data), len);
157}
158
159
160UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(const sockaddr &addr, char *data, unsigned int len) {
161 auto req = loop().resource<details::SendReq>(
162 std::unique_ptr<char[], details::SendReq::Deleter>{data, [](char *) {
163 }}, len);
164
165 auto listener = [ptr = shared_from_this()](const auto &event, const auto &) {
166 ptr->publish(event);
167 };
168
169 req->once<ErrorEvent>(listener);
170 req->once<SendEvent>(listener);
171 req->send(get(), &addr);
172}
173
174
175template<typename I>
176UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(std::string ip, unsigned int port, char *data, unsigned int len) {
177 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
178 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
179 send(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr), data, len);
180}
181
182
183template<typename I>
184UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::send(Addr addr, char *data, unsigned int len) {
185 send<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port, data, len);
186}
187
188
189template<typename I>
190UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(const sockaddr &addr, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
191 uv_buf_t bufs[] = { uv_buf_init(data.get(), len) };
192 auto bw = uv_udp_try_send(get(), bufs, 1, &addr);
193
194 if(bw < 0) {
195 publish(ErrorEvent{bw});
196 bw = 0;
197 }
198
199 return bw;
200}
201
202
203template<typename I>
204UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(std::string ip, unsigned int port, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
205 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
206 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
207 return trySend(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr), std::move(data), len);
208}
209
210
211template<typename I>
212UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(Addr addr, std::unique_ptr<char[]> data, unsigned int len) {
213 return trySend<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port, std::move(data), len);
214}
215
216
217template<typename I>
218UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(const sockaddr &addr, char *data, unsigned int len) {
219 uv_buf_t bufs[] = { uv_buf_init(data, len) };
220 auto bw = uv_udp_try_send(get(), bufs, 1, &addr);
221
222 if(bw < 0) {
223 publish(ErrorEvent{bw});
224 bw = 0;
225 }
226
227 return bw;
228}
229
230
231template<typename I>
232UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(std::string ip, unsigned int port, char *data, unsigned int len) {
233 typename details::IpTraits<I>::Type addr;
234 details::IpTraits<I>::addrFunc(ip.data(), port, &addr);
235 return trySend(reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr &>(addr), data, len);
236}

238
239template<typename I>
240UVW_INLINE int UDPHandle::trySend(Addr addr, char *data, unsigned int len) {
241 return trySend<I>(std::move(addr.ip), addr.port, data, len);
242}

244
245template<typename I>
246UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::recv() {
247 invoke(&uv_udp_recv_start, get(), &allocCallback, &recvCallback<I>);
248}
249
250
251UVW_INLINE void UDPHandle::stop() {
252 invoke(&uv_udp_recv_stop, get());
253}

256UVW_INLINE size_t UDPHandle::sendQueueSize() const noexcept {
257 return uv_udp_get_send_queue_size(get());
258}
259
260
261UVW_INLINE size_t UDPHandle::sendQueueCount() const noexcept {
262 return uv_udp_get_send_queue_count(get());
263}
